name: Flying Scotsman
snippet: First steam locomotive offically recorded at 100 mph, 1934. But still a contentious issue! Part of the National Collection at http://www.nrm.org.uk/ourcollection

name: Papyrus
snippet: Holder of the world speed record for steam at 108 mph, 1935. Sadly now baked-bean tins.

name: Silver Link
snippet: First of class. Holder of the British speed record for steam at 112 mph on the inaugural Silver Jubilee high-speed streamlined service between Kings Cross and Newcastle, 1935.

name: Mallard
snippet: Current holder of the world speed record for steam at 126 mph, 1938. Part of the National Collection at http://www.nrm.org.uk/ourcollection
